level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to establish the standards and procedures under which eligible children are enrolled in and disenrolled from the District of Columbia’s Medicaid Managed Care Program for Disabled Children and Youths.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is D.C. Code, 2001 Ed. §1-307.02; Reorganization Plan No. 4 of 1996, 3 D.C. Code, 2001 Ed. at 413; Mayor’s Order 97-42 (February 18, 1997); and Mayor’s Order 93-218.
